title: 2016 is going on
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\large x^{2016}+2008!=21^y"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the number of pairs of "},{"type":"text","text":"integer","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" solutions "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(x,y)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfying the above equation."}]}]}

"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for all those sequences.
So finding the number of sequences "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016÷6=336"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we can calculate the answer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"336×a=336×9=\boxed{3024}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

title: 2016? Nah I Choose 4016!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+\\dfrac{1}{b+\\dfrac{1}{c}} = \\frac{4016}{2007} , \\qquad  \\dfrac{1}{c+\\dfrac{1}{b+\\dfrac{1}{a}}} = \\dfrac{p}{q}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a,b,c,p"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"q"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfy the system of equations above. If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"q"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are coprime, submit your answer as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p+q"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                    "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relevant wiki: Fraction Arithmetic","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{4016}{2007}=2+\dfrac{1}{\frac{2007}{2}}=2+\dfrac{1}{1003+\frac{1}{2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Thus by comparison, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=c=1/2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b=1003"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".Thus,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{c+\frac{1}{b+\frac{1}{a}}} =\frac{1}{a+\frac{1}{b+\frac{1}{c}}}~~(\text{Since } a=c)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Note this is the reciprocal of the first expression given in question and thus equals "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{2007}{4016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".Thus, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" p + q = 6023 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
